James, even though some simple-minded people don't seem to know that even the scientists are 'scratching their heads' over whether it really was the HOTTEST year on record or not. I've been around nigh onto 80 years and have seen far hotter weather than we have had this past year. In fact, I don't see or feel any difference at all. Weather comes and weather goes. Don't get all tied up in a knot over something that is out of our hands but is in the hands of Almighty God- the maker of heaven and earth. Does anyone know of any that is higher than Jehovah- God?
